headerButtonPermission.Name: Button Permission Level
headerButtonPermission.Hint: The minimum role required to see the 'Scriptable Items' button in the header of item sheets.

showHeaderButtonLabel.Name: Display Button Label
showHeaderButtonLabel.Hint: If checked, the button's label is displayed.

chatCardScriptButtonPrefix.Name: Chat Card Button Prefix
chatCardScriptButtonPrefix.Hint: Sets the prefix for the script name shown on script chat card buttons. If empty, the prefix is skipped.

chatCardScriptButtonIcon.Name: Chat Card Button Icon
chatCardScriptButtonIcon.Hint: Sets the icon classes for the icon shown on script chat card buttons. If empty, no icon will be shown.
